metadata.title: CVE-2018-11202 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in H5S_hyper_make_spans inH5Shyper.c in the HDF HDF5 1.10.2 library. It could allow a remote denialof service attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
